transcript: you don't have to finance or lease a car to save money instead why not buy a car for 10 grand and drive it into the ground you might even be able to sell it for the same amount in three years meaning you drove it for free the entire time that's what I ended up doing when I was starting out and even though at the time I was a cash millionaire in my bank account I drove a Prius with a dent in the side door and a crack in the windshield and someone actually saw me at an event that I was presenting at and they were like wait I thought we were supposed to be rich and I said shouldn't judge me on my car you should judge me on my bank account
